Package PDFjet.NET

Class TextBox

  • Object
    • PDFjet.NET.TextBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable
    public class TextBox
extends Object
implements IDrawable
    A box containing line-wrapped text.

    Defaults: x = 0f y = 0f width = 300f height = 0f alignment = Align.LEFT valign = Align.TOP spacing = 3f margin = 1f

    This class was originally developed by Ronald Bourret. It was completely rewritten in 2013 by Eugene Dragoev.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a text box and sets the font and the text.

        Parameters:
